Class ColonyNodeView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ColonyNodeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ColonyNodeView
extends javax.swing.JPanel

class ColonyNodeView provides a graphical view for a single node in the ant colony

See Also:
Serialized Form

 void setPheromoneLevel(int pheromone)
          display the level of pheromone in the node represented by this view the amount of pheromone is displayed in 2 ways: 1) numerically 2) by the background color: a) 0 units: no color b) 1 - 199 units: violet c) 200 - 399 units: blue d) 400 - 599 units: green e) 600 - 799 units: yellow f) 800 - 999 units: orange g) >= 1000 units: red

Method Detail

initComponents

private void initComponents()
initialize child components

layoutComponents

private void layoutComponents()
lay out child components and add them to this view

showNode

public void showNode()
make this view visible use this method to reveal the contents of the node represented by this view

hideNode

public void hideNode()
hide this view this method is used to hide the contents of the node represented by this view should only be used during initialization of the simulation

setID

public void setID(java.lang.String id)
set the value for the ID label

Parameters:
id - String that uniquely identifies the node represented by this view

setQueen

public void setQueen(boolean queenPresent)
display whether or not the queen ant is present in the node represented by this view if queen is present this view's background color is dark gray if the queen is not present this view's background color is the color of a normal node

Parameters:
queenPresent - true if queen is in the node represented by this view false otherwise

setForagerCount

public void setForagerCount(int numForagers)
display the number of foragers in the node represented by this view

Parameters:
numForagers - the number of foragers

setScoutCount

public void setScoutCount(int numScouts)
display the number of scouts in the node represented by this view

Parameters:
numScouts - the number of scouts

setSoldierCount

public void setSoldierCount(int numSoldiers)
display the number of soldiers in the node represented by this view

Parameters:
numSoldiers - the number of soldiers

setBalaCount

public void setBalaCount(int numBalas)
display the number of Bala ants in the node represented by this view

Parameters:
numBalas - the number of Balas

setFoodAmount

public void setFoodAmount(int food)
display the amount of food in the node represented by this view

Parameters:
food - the amount of food

setPheromoneLevel

public void setPheromoneLevel(int pheromone)
display the level of pheromone in the node represented by this view the amount of pheromone is displayed in 2 ways: 1) numerically 2) by the background color: a) 0 units: no color b) 1 - 199 units: violet c) 200 - 399 units: blue d) 400 - 599 units: green e) 600 - 799 units: yellow f) 800 - 999 units: orange g) >= 1000 units: red

Parameters:
pheromone - the amount of pheromone

showQueenIcon

public void showQueenIcon()
display the queen icon to indicate presence of queen ant

hideQueenIcon

public void hideQueenIcon()
hide the queen icon to indicate no queen ant present

public void showBalaIcon()
display the Bala icon to indicate presence of 1 or more Bala ants

hideBalaIcon

public void hideBalaIcon()
hide the Bala icon to indicate no Bala ants present

display the soldier icon to indicate presence of 1 or more soldier ants

hideSoldierIcon

hide the soldier icon to indicate no soldier ants present
